name: Drawer (support Ukraine)
description:
20 modern hand-drawn illustrations

and icons


Each illustration was hand-drawn. The inspiration came from discovering a sense of life in behavior patterns.


20 full-scale creations convey the life of web development, office life, emotions, and many more.


  • 20 hand-drawn illustrations & icons
  • 100% vector
  • Well organized, named & very easy to use
  • Great for Websites, Desktop and Mobile Apps
  • Fully scalable and editable
  • Supports Figma, SVG and AI


Get full version


Support Ukrainian design and Ukraine!
